description:
The competition in the Rating Game is getting heated. Can Team Gremory keep their cool and prevail, or will Issei be undone by a strip show?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As a Family Member of Rias Gremory
En fier vassal de Rias Gremory
Rias Gremory no Kenzoku to Shite
リアス・グレモリーの眷属として
